bill.summary:
Be Responsive to all Veterans Expeditiously Act of 2016 or the BRAVE Act of 2016
This bill requires the primary telephone line for any Department of Veterans Affairs facility to include voice mail.
The introductory message of any voice mail shall inform the caller of: (1) the facility's name, (2) the expected response time, and (3) an emergency telephone number.
